Texts.Text: You come accross the All-Seeing Crown of WTFpwness, and then here comes a fucking bandit leader. Like, HOW-LEE-SHIT dude, a motherfucking bandit leader. So he's like "Heyaz wuts up?". Without remorse you draw your blade and just behead the fuck out of him, then play soccer with what remain of his faggoty head. And THEN you just take the motherfucking CROWN OF ALL SEEING EYES, DUDE OMG! "'Tis a great FOOKIN' day", you tell yourself.
HOLY SHIT LOOK AT THIS FUCKING ARTIFACT OLOLOLOL.
